results.name: G.f.: 2*q * Product_{n>=1} (1 + q^(2*n))/((1 + q^n)*(1 + q^(2*n-1))*(1 + q^(4*n))) in powers of q.
comment: G.f. of row 1 in rectangular array A292929.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
mathematica: nmax = 50; CoefficientList[Series[2*Product[1/((1 + x^(2*k-1))^2 * (1 + x^(4*k))), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 23 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 22 2017
